de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.arraylike

Class NumberVectorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.arraylike.NumberVectorAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArrayAdapter<java.lang.Number,NumberVector>, NumberArrayAdapter<java.lang.Number,NumberVector>

    public class NumberVectorAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements NumberArrayAdapter<java.lang.Number,NumberVector>
    Adapter to use a feature vector as an array of features. Use the static instance STATIC!
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
